result:
Final Submission

All contributed papers should be submitted via the SoftConf.

Final Full Paper Submission Guideline

1. Revise your munuscript until you are satisfied with the final version of your paper.

2. Click SoftConf to enter the front page of IEEE RCAR 2021 and then login to access to the User Console.

3. In the Submission(s) label column, you would see Your current Submission(s) . Click on Your current Submission(s) then you would go to a new page where your all accepted submissions (Paper ID: Title) would be listed.

4. Click on each Paper ID: Title then you would go to a new page where you would see the Full Paper Camera-ready Submission or Short Paper Camera-ready Submission depending on your Contributed Paper Type.

5. Click on Full Paper Camera-ready Submission or Short Paper Camera-ready Submission then you would go the Final Submission Page.

6. For the final full paper submission, you are required to fill in the Title of Submission, List of Authors, complete the IEEE Copyright Transfer form, and upload the copyright file, final manuscript with IEEE PDF eXpress compliance test result and one-page digest slice. Please follow the instructions on the submission page and remember to click save button after finish all procedures to submit.

• PDF Copy of IEEE Electronic Copyright: For all the final full papers submitted to IEEE for inclusion in the Xplore database, the electronic IEEE Copyright Form (eCF) is required to transfer ownership rights of the intellectual property to IEEE. Please note: If you do not complete a publication agreement with IEEE by means of signing and submitting an IEEE Copyright Form, your paper cannot be published by IEEE.

• IEEE PDF eXpress Compliance Test: For your paper to be included in IEEE RCAR 2021 Proceedings, its PDF file must be IEEE Xplore compliant. You should login to IEEE PDF eXpress using the conference ID, coming soon... , to check for this. After your paper passes the compliance test, a confirmation email will be sent to you. You must submit this email in PDF as one of the items of the final submission. (PDF eXpress Compliance Test site for this conference will open on April 20th.)

• One-page Digest Slice: Upload one-page PowerPoint slide for RCAR 2021 Digest in .ppt format using this template .

Full Paper

• You are going to submit a single PDF that has to conform to the manuscript preparation guidelines. In particular, you should use the provided templates and check the PDF for compliance within PaperPlaza.

• LaTex: http://ras.papercept.net/conferences/support/tex.php (LaTex template)

• Word: http://ras.papercept.net/conferences/support/word.php (Word template)

• Paper size: As for IEEE conferences, the paper size for submission must be A4.

• Paper format: Two-column format in the IEEE style is required.

• Page limit: For the first submission, a manuscript can be of 4-6 pages. For the final submission, a manuscript should be of 6 pages, with 2 additional pages allowed but at an extra charge.

• PDF file: A manuscript file needs to be converted into its PDF version for submission. Please limit the size of the PDF file to be 5 M.

If you have any further questions, please don't hesitate to contact the conference secretaries by Email: ieee.rcar@gmail.com .
